name: Courtney Bolanos
text: Excellent service! Kevin is extremely helpful and greets every customer that walks in the door! I would say he's, definitely an asset to your company.

name: Brad Keith
text: Been ordering from Blaze for a while with no issues. Last night 7/30/20 I ordered 3 pizzas and the underside of the crust was BURNT BLACK on all 3 pizzas. Needless to say, it was not edible. $43 dollars down the drain. Clearly you wouldn't …More

name: Tiffany Hee
text: Love making my own veggie pizza with extra sauce on the regular crust baked well done. Also love the craft nonalcoholic drinks.

name: Tyler Coomes
text: Great pizza and a wide arrange of options for you to either pick from the menu or concoct your own yummy pie. Issue is the customer service. Very slow, and you'll have to repeat yourself multiple times before anyone understands what you're …More

name: Scarlett Penford
text:
#scarlettsuggests Blaze into Blaze! 🔥
How can you not like a pizza that you build yourself? Today my pizza was free with the purchase of a drink. Make sure you download the app on your phone before …More

name: Sophia Plays
text: Great customer service!  Always friendly and efficient.  Delicious pizza

name: AJ P
text: Always great pizza and Kevin's customer service was phenomenal.

name: Charlene Obstgarten
text: Ordered online.  Arrived 5 minutes before order was to be ready at 545.  1st pizza was done at 545.  It is 608 and still waiting for 2nd pizza, was told 1st one had a hole. Next time i will order from somewhere else.  Service slow, not worth an extra 40+ minute wait.

name: Thomas Bulk
text: If you are a vegan this is a good pizza place because the pizza dough is plant based

name: nicole smith
text: loved the pizza here! They had plenty of vegan options and I got almost all of them.awsome staff members

name: Rayne Thurman
text: Great staff and amazing food 👌

name: Shayla Fowler
text: I loved the pizza here! They had plenty of vegan options and I got almost all of them. Only ones I did not get were the vegan "chicken" and the mushrooms and tomatoes. The line was very long and that made it very hard for anyone to get …More

name: James Baylis
text: Definitely our favorite pizza restaurant, with options for gluten free and dairy free.

name: tanisha mcgee
text: Amazing customer service. My pizza was cooked perfectly and the salad was fresh

name: Bryan Curiel
text: Hands down one of my favorite pizza places. The pizzas are quick and have a good flavor. The staff is usually friendly and keep the place clean despite them always being so busy.

name: Deryl Deavenport
text: Pepperoni pizza was pretty good.  The pesto garlic pizza was dry but good flavor.  The salad was really bad. It was old , wilted, brown in places and smelled and tasted like refrigerant and the life was sucked out of it from being made days earlier. Tge dressing was pretty good though.

name: Praneeth Akinapalli
text: Lot of pizza customization options. Only complaint is they hurry up finishing sauces and even splashes it unevenly some times and forgets to put them on pick up or online orders. Pizza taste is great though.

name: haben negassi
text: The service was good but the food didn’t meet our expectations. If only the corporate chain improves the taste of their pizza.

name: David Cueva
text: This is the best pizza place you could go too on this block. Little Caesers taste old and not fresh, domino’s takes too long and dont put enough toppings. Here you dont get charged extra toppings and its always a 5-10 min wait unlike other pizza places where they make you wait 20+ minutes.

name: Nathan Welly
text: Good place good service love the way I can make pizza different ways

name: Cynthia Luna
text: Pizzas are good.  New guy didnt know what a margarita pizza was.  Had to tell him ingredients.  Otherwise good and reasonably priced for what you get.  To me, better than a personal pan at Pizza Hut for just a couple bucks more.  Fresher ingredients and made right in front of you.

name: Justin Weathersbee
text: Great service.  Staff is awesome.  Have never had a bad experience.  Tried it a few months back during a sponsored school event where they donated a portion of proceeds to or Elementary school.  We have been back 10 times since. …More

name: Robert Anderson
text: Pizza was great Friday nite. But one employee kept correcting another employee as he took our order. Then that same guy complained "I have to make a salad because you forgot" I enjoyed my meal but his attitude affected my experience. We did go there Thursday also, and that group was great

name: Ellysia Banks
text: Yummy pizza made fresh to your own specifications. Generous donations for fund-raisers for school clubs and non-profits. Download their app for reward points towards free pizza.

name: Quinneth Cavaghan
text:
Well priced, similar to a Subway set up here.  Clean, nice, pretty good food.  I would suggest the thicker crust.
Would come back

name: Ryan
text:
Building your own pizza is amazing. If you like a little stronger crust, ask for them to put it through the oven twice, otherwise it's pretty floppy.
Great staff who are always kind and patient.

name: Edoardo Tortoledo
text: Very clean!!! Very fast!!! Absolutely delicious!!! The staff was amazing!! The place was really clean and the whole experience was just great!! Everyone was very respectful and attentive!!! Great experience!! Can’t say enough good things about this place!!

name: Karin Tenney
text: Like build your own pizza!!

name: Daniel Marrero
text: Who ever make the Pizza there they do a good job

name: Robert Nimmo
text: Wow, great pizza!  We went for the first time to take advantage of the Pi Day  pizza special.  It's way better than Pizza Rev.  They are very generous with the customized toppings. The personal pizzas will definitely fill you up, with a …More

name: Steve McC
text: First time trying this place tonight, parking was good, hit the dinner time rush, so there was a bit of a wait.  Staff was friendly taking the order and putting it together.  They make the (thin) crust in a cool way, so it's always …More

name: Griselda Hernandez
text: Pizza is so delicouse i love making my own pizza so good to eat plus the drinks are so good to.

name: Naga Teja Puttamsetti
text: Worst service.. we ordered barbecue chicken pizza and they dint even add barbecue just gave the plain chicken pizza..

name: No Name
text: Pizza is good, but they are not equipped to handle the Friday night crowd. Too many online orders mean you wait in line fifteen min and it doesn't really move because they're filling those orders instead. Takes around thirty min to actually …More

name: Sean V
text: Use to love eating here, because they make pizza in front of you. But ever since they came out with that new large pizza that you HAVE to order on blaze pizza app, You can't walk in and order a large pizza. So the only thing I want, I can't go in and order. Time to find new pizza place .

name: Court Dukes
text: Great pizza, friendly staff . Small pizzas though if you are feeding a family better order a couple!

name: Tash
text: LOVE this place! Building your own pizza is the best!

name: Dustin Szabo
text: The pizza is great, the people working here not so much.

name: Rich Hofius
text: Best pizza in Henderson.  Made the way you want it..... quickly.  Great service.

name: Teresa Harper
text: BEST Pizza I have EVER eaten....

name: j Bradford
text: Good pizza, good options, and great service

name: Scare bear
text: Tried ordering online from this location at 3 pm on a sunday. We were across the street at a store, was prompted that this location currently had too many online orders at the time, and asked to try again later. Earliest available pick up …More

name: Ana Manuel
text: Best Blaze pizza location and I’ve been to all of them in town. Great service, food quality and quantity. Thanks for always making me a great pizza :)

name: Ron Keathley
text: Fantastic! Great food... great service! Highly recommend this place. David is so friendly and helpful.

name: Jon C
text: Delivered incorrect pizza. Kinda soggy and seemed like some of the cheese was not melted.

name: J Cole
text: 5 star service...pizza is decent too. Even if its busy there's no wait. 10 mins max

name: Joe Miera
text: The counter staff was fantastic and the pizza and salad were first class delicious. I had the Hawaiian pizza with the summer squash salad.

name: Live in Las Vegas
text: The staff is excellent

name: Patrick Dastarfish
text: You mest my pizza up 2 times in row I don't know why is so hard you say no, you get extra of it . An they won't show you it b4 you leave check there work b4 you leave . That ruined my birthday

name: A-star Miramontes
text: Wow! Great cauliflower pizza dough. I'm impressed.

name: O. Profit
text: Very good quality food. They make the pizza right in front of you.  And surprisingly, it does not take long at all. And for one price, you get to choose as many toppings as you like. And they have gluten free and dairy free options, which my vegan wife loves.  This place is great.

name: Adi H
text: Awesome 👌   Kids loved it!

name: Emily Peterson
text: This place is amazing. They are so friendly and accommodating. I have a tomato allergy and if I tell them that, they make sure to even get me a fresh white sauce so I don't have to worry about the red sauce being accidentally splattered in …More

name: Martin Sena
text: While I'm normally happy with my service and the atmosphere. Today was a great set back. While I appreciate the upgrade for a screw up on my take two I didn't get a sauce when I wanted one and after explaining twice I didn't want arugula I …More

name: Dee Nick
text: Love this place with healthy pizza alternatives.  Wood fired pizza made like subway sandwiches.....make your own.  Pizza under $10!

name: Chris Rivers
text: Relaxing atmosphere, friendly staff and delicious pizza made my way. Couldn't ask for better.

name: Johannes Marlena
text: Solid build-it-yourself pizza joint. Extensive menu of toppings, good salads and a bit more than your usual fountain drink choices. Very good value and comfortable dining space.

name: coco brown
text: When entered they greeted us with a friendly welcome to blaze and then asked if we have been there before or our first time. The staff were very friendly and ready to serve you. The pizza was delicious too per our specification. Thank you team blaze for an amazing lunch experience!

name: Samuel Frey
text: Keto crust! Gluten free! White top! All phenomenal, will be back frequently

name: Mahak Jhamani
text: So many options. Gluten free crust, keto crust etc.

name: Charles Couch
text: First time here and i was given the run down and was very impressed. I have to say after building our pizza and watching it cook my taste buds were on over load. Our pizza was Delicious crust thin little char but not burnt. The toppings were on point in fewer words ill be back......

name: Law Cook
text: Long time to make your order

name: Naz Stobe-Kirst
text: Blaze sets the bar for stone oven fired pizza. All exactly the way you want it, unlimited toppings, healthy veggie and meat choices and all for one great price. Blaze is fast and extremely satisfying.

name: Patricia Weiss
text: Can cater to food allergies including glove changes, clean utensils and cleaned up the work areas as my pizza came up to them. They offer a ton of choices and GREAT customer service. We will definitely be back!!

name: DragonBlood
text: Pretty good. The keto crust isnt that good though

name: Chris Coignard
text: Longer than normal wait time this round, and none of the employees seemed to be very personable. Still love the food and the place.

name: Jeanine Colvin
text: Oh yeah, baby! Build your own animal-free pizza at Blaze. They offer dairy-free cheese, plant proteins and a variety of delicious veggies. Top it all off with balsamic glaze drizzle and arugula leaves. Mm mm!

name: Mary Quimby
text: It was very good and the service was great!

name: A H
text: Fast service and great pizza for the price. All employees are friendly and there's plenty of good options to customize to your liking. Atmosphere inside is very cozy as well.

name: Debra Connor
text: Ingredients are always fresh, prices are low and pizza is fast. I have no complaints

name: Rita Cooper
text: Can't beat pizza being made before your eyes and being able to completely customize your order.  Even the Caesar salad was great.  Love the blood orange lemonade.  I would go just for that!

name: Anthony Ruiz
text: Placed an order and it never was made. They charged me anyway.

name: David Ivar
text: This place is by far the slickest pizza joint I've ever been to. They make everything right in front of you and then they put it in a wood fire furnace. Top Notch garlic knots and antipasto

name: Grand Illusion
text: Fast, tasty pizza.  Great for lunch if you work close and only have 30 minutes for lunch. Seriously, you can build a pizza sub-shop style, and be eating it 10 minutes later (noticibly slower if you go at peak times).  They have all the …More

name: Ghazaleh Rezaei
text: We stopped by to get a couple pizzas! The employee who helped us Was so friendly ( I think his name was Aria). He was quick yet attentive and really listened to our order.  We will always ask for him to make our order!

name: Paul Hammer
text: My aunt suggested this place as something different and we stopped in for lunch. I'm glad we did. The food was great and the service was just as good. Would love to have a place like this back home in NY as an alternative to the regular traditional pizza places.

name: Greg Illes
text: Excellent pizza joint for eat in or take out, with super helpful and fast staff. If you don't get a pizza that you like here, it's all your fault because it's a build as you go affair. You can have it absolutely any way you want, including gluten free crust.

name: M. B.
text: My child is allergic to dairy, and we always trust this place to get her pizza, it's been always safe for her using their vegan cheese, and they always put new gloves when you tell them about the allergy situation. I love this place!

name: S M
text: LOVE BLAZE!!! Gluten free, Dairy free options. The staff were so pleasant. The pizza is actually some of the best gluten free pizza I've ever had. it's not easy to eat out with dietary restrictions. Thank you so much for accommodating. You've gained customers for life.

name: Daniel Sowell
text: The pizza is good but discovered that they no longer sell beer or wine. Hey manager, not everyone likes soda, water, or iced tea with their pizza. Taking my business to PizzaRev, beer and wine is on their menu.

name: Alberto Gomes
text: The best pizza ever. For me is the Best I ever had. Build your own in the best choice. So far the best pizza. Thin and well cooked also with all the toppings you can imagine. So fast too. 5 stars so far.

name: Josh Barker
text: Embarrassingly, I've eaten a ton of pizza. With that in mind I have to say that Blaze makes the best pizza I've ever tasted. …More

name: Joshua Hall
text: Blaze is always awesome. Service is always at least 9/10 and the pizza is consistently good. Lots of ingredients you can't get at other pizza places, and it's even cheaper.

name: Brian Friedman
text: Absolutely love this place. The pizza is always perfect and the young staff does a great job. All courteous and they work their butts off.

name: Lena S.
text: Blaze Pizza is such a great place to eat!  If you love pizza, you'll love this place.  They have a menu of pizzas to try or you can create your own masterpiece.  Even with their menu pizzas you can add anything else to it or take stuff out …More

name: Eric Glover
text: Love to make my own pizza with the same price

name: Patrick Liebl
text: Good fast food type pizza place. They will make any type of pizza you ask for and it is really quick and fresh. Also serve salads that are very flavorful!

name: Nikki Mascola
text: Blaze pizza is the best. Why get pizza anywhere else? You can put whatever you want on your pizza at no extra charge and the price is well worth it. Must go

name: U.S. Veteran
text: Absolutely outstanding for the second location that I have been to. As soon as we got there we were greeted at the door, I don't know how you like service,  but that's always a warm and fuzzy for me.  Immediately helped and guided through …More

name: Farhad Fallah
text: Reasonable price... Nice choices of topings

name: DianeMarie USA
text: Love this place!!  Make your own pizza with fresh vegetables.  Nice thin crust.  Tastes great!

name: V K
text: Okay, I'm only reviewing this place for their gluten free and vegan pizza in which I ordered. The crust was chewy and flavorless. The vegan cheese was horrid. I've tried a lot of pizza places that offer vegan cheese and this was by far the …More

name: Madison Mongeau
text: Good and fast service! Pizza is yummy

name: James Ferry
text: Always a great experience here. Pizzas are made to order so they are always fresh and are a good size. Ingredients are plentiful and fresh with many options available. The price is right for every everything on their menu! Very fast and friendly.

name: Shaina Lopez
text: My favorite place to get pizza!!! I love build your own pizza! Super inexpensive to make a pizza exactly how you like it and then some!

name: Rosalee Wingo
text: One of the best pizzas I have ever eaten.

name: Rose Corral
text: I must have driven by this place for years, then my coworkers and I stopped in one day on our way back to the office. It's hands down one of the best pizza I've had in years. I had the white pizza, it was fresh, perfectly cooked, and just plain delicious. $8 for a personal freshly crafted pizza is a deal you can't pass up.

name: Veronica Grace Demers
text: This is amazing it’s only seven bucks to build your own pizza and all that, the only thing I have to say that’s negative is eat it there do not take it home because by the time you take it home it gets all soggy and gross even if you put it …More

name: Jonathan Nino
text: Went during prime Friday dinner time. It took about 40 minutes to get our food. We had a side salad and a smore that they said would give us when our pizza was done, but given it took at least another 15 minutes from the time we paid til …More

name: Sonya Tremble
text: Pizza is great! Sausage is a bit overly salty for me but my husband seems to like it. There's lots of toppings to choose from and the staff is great for the most part! Very adorable!

name: Mike Gearhart
text: good price ...great quality

name: Dimple Uppal
text: Absolutely mouth watering pizza recipes. They make the pizza to order - very quick and excellent customer service. If you don't like their pizza they will remake it and give you another one! We love going there and do it often. Keep it goin Blaze!

name: Adrian Blua
text: Great food and excellent service.

name: Karen Taylor
text: Fast service even when it is busy. Great food. Just tell them what you want. They will add more or less. They seem to always have a smile on their faces. I enjoy eating here.

name: Natalia B
text: They need a better system... People have to wait in line on the wall after they order...Too many workers doing one thing... Employee's should have shirts that fit especially in this high end location! I was on a PostMate pickup that was …More

name: -Amanda Giardini
text: Great lunch special

name: Son Ev
text: 40 minutes to get a pizza that was not bad.

name: Fly Runway Heading
text: The pizza is really good but the service is super slow

name: Sara
text: good food, good service most of the time. it gets super busy at all locations and this is no exception. the downside of hiring all teenagers is their customer service isnt always the greatest.

name: Chris Hugo
text: Although we visited during a Saturday night dinner rush, the flavors were outstanding! Also ordered tomato and mozzarella salad which was excellent. Will visit again!

name: Stephanie Mahlig
text: Good sized pizza for the money. Excellent options for toppings. Crust quality is iffy depending upon the chef.  Sometimes too well done and sometimes not done enough.  Overall pretty decent.

name: Christian Wamsley
text: Great pizza and really friendly staff. We get the gluten free dough and it's pretty awesome. We don't have a gluten sensitivity but it's just a nice thin and almost chewy crust.

name: Paul Molloy
text: Can a transplanted New Yorker pizza snob (now a vegan) find a good pie outside the Big Apple? The answer is YES! …More

name: Eric Rodrigues
text: Terrible. Ordered online and was given a pickup time only to be told the order hadn't been started.  Was told it would be 20 minutes.  40 minutes goes by and many were in my same situation or worse.  Many employees were working hard to fill …More

name: Lisa K Bittick
text: Wonderful staff!  Very helpful & extremely friendly.  We are from Texas & my husband was here on a business trip.  He enjoyed Blaze Pizza 5 times this week.  Great food & friendly service!

name: Linda Capnerhurst
text: Pizza is always good love the coupons too!

name: AnJolene Martin
text: I am extremely disappointed. As a gluten sensitive person, there was no crust that compares to Blaze. I was a faithful customer, as this is the only true delicious gf pizza I’ve tried. Today, we were smacked with the news that the gf crust …More

name: The Ghasty
text: Great food, neeed to keep stations more tidy, everytime we visit it is a mess!

name: Esteban Lopez
text: Great taste AND wayyyyy faster than Rev pizza by like half hour. No lie

name: Sam Yoon
text: Great Quality for a Great Price! Make your Own Pizzas starting at $8 is a Great Price! Also the Blood Orange Lemonade is Fresh and Delicious! Much better than PizzaRev or Pieology!

name: Miradil Omuraliev
text: We like there simple pi piza😋👍

name: Chandler Shepherd
text: Good build your own pizza for reasonable price. I love the thin crust.

name: Susan K.
text: I definitely will go back. The service was very friendly and fast. The food was great!

name: Kristine Belis
text: The pizza is fantastic but every time I order online & come in to pick it up, they leave it sitting on the top of the counter but don't call my name. I'm always there before the estimated time but it sits there for 10 minutes before I finally realize that's my pizza sitting there getting cold.

name: Goya Nourijanian
text: #blazepizzbest# everyone is very friendly. Service is great and fast. Pizza is delicious. Love this place.

name: Julio Chavez
text: Love this place but I always get heartburn after I eat here.

name: Jennifer Linch
text: Love this place. The only thing I dont enjoy is seeing the droopy pants and the workers' underwear when the pants are droopy.

name: Robert SILVESTRONE
text: You see we love blaze pizza you have to try this place they make the pizza for you and you could put anything you want on it really really tasty pizza at a very good price.

name: Kaori Kinoko
text: Great pizza for an awesome price! Has gluten free (allergy friendly) and vegan. If it we're in my hometown, I'd go here all the time!

name: Dorcus Bates
text: Omg the pizza are to die for,you make your own it doesn't take long to wait  luv it.

name: Neal Matzkin
text: Blaze pizza is a very good blaze pizza.  I say that because it is a fools errand to try to find a pizza in Las Vegas that lives up to what you remember you had from where ever you are from.  Blaze is thin crusted basically individual pizza …More

name: Amber Mull-Bovetti
text: Had a great time ordering the pizza I wanted and my 11 year old son enjoyed ordering his custome pizza and it tasted amazing.

name: navy79930
text: For Postmates review.. Do not order/accept orders through Postmates as your order may get coupled with 1-2 other orders... I am usually waiting at this location for just way too long.. While I'm waiting on one order the other may sit there …More

name: Jaz is Robs wife
text: The crew was all over the place they were irritated they wasn't into the anyway you want it pizza idea no enthusiasm what so ever. Didnt want to make my pizza the way i wanted it so they Burnt My Pizza! It is chaotic at this location long …More

name: Toni C.
text: I came during their lunch rush, yet even though the line was to the door I got through the line and received my food in about 10 minutes! I ordered gluten and dairy free, and it was very easy to do so! They even offer glove changes for …More

name: Drill Sergeant
text: I had heard about Blaze over a year ago, it was better than what I imagined.  Awesome atmosphere. Great options to building your own pizza. Delicious!!!

name: Mike Hite
text:
Been here several times. Yummy quick pizza made to order. Delicious fruit drinks in case you don't do soda.
Specialty pizzas or order how you like. Friendly informative staff.
Location is busy sometimes

name: Charlie Dreitzer
text: Great food, pretty fast, good overall experience.

name: Rachel Bickmore
text: We love this place. They are fast fired, build your own pizzas. They have lots of options, including gluten free. They usually move pretty fast but sometimes things get backed up by the oven. Very clean, comfortable dining area and very friendly staff.

name: jc carl
text: Build your pizza any way you want then cooked to order in a wood fired brick oven.

name: RoxAnna Foudray
text:
Love this pizza ..

the staff is always welcoming and helpful.  So makes the whole experience an …More

name: Sean McKnight
text:
Great Pizza for the price!!  Very good service and the food tastes fresh.  My boys love this place!!  Very good with vegetarian and gluten free pizza as well.
The App works well, but sometimes may be slower than actually coming into the store to order.

name: Adam Roberts
text: Love this place. Get exactly what you want with quality ingredients. Fast too. It's fast too.

name: David Walk
text: Best fast food keto option imaginable,  hope they can keep the keto crust in stock...

name: Vik Sridhar
text: Love this place. Staff are so friendly. You can pick as many toppings as you want - and great on price.

name: Brian Patterson
text: #veganpizza still on my shirts for the perfect vegan pizza they've come awful close. The best so far and by far the best service of any fast casual place I've ever been. The staff was extremely helpful move me on Down the Line. Very …More

name: ALEX GAMEZ
text: Blaze is a great place to eat pizza and drink the house made lemonade

name: CM Galaxy Jam
text: The pizza was good, the employees were friendly, and my son had quite the experience here, his first time ordering a build-your-own pizza. He got to choose from sauces, cheeses, meats, and veggies all for a flat price. Fun place for family or friends.

name: mindy black
text: Love your vegan options.

name: Or Madar
text: Love this place good customer service great food and super fast very recommended

name: Yolanda Brown
text:
Staff was very friendly
Pizza is terrific.  Would be going there again when I go back to Henderson, NV.

name: Annalisa santollo
text: The best pizza around, I want to open a franchise for myself!

name: Tracy Abbate
text: Blaze pizza is consistent. Affordable and always made with the freshest  ingredients. I enjoy this place.

name: Bill L.
text: Terrible service. Poorly run location. Call in for pick up orders take over an over. But they tell you it will be 15 minutes.  So you get to show up and wait an hour at their counter.

name: james chrestensen
text: This place is delicious. The only problem with them was on their take two deal. You get a half pizza, salad or 4 dough knots. The problem was I asked for the pizza with the 4 knots and they only gave me 2 knots and said I’d have to paid for …More

name: Kim DeMatteo
text: One price for a build-your-own pizza. The size of the pizza is not large enough for 2 hungry people, so we typically get 2. We'll usually build a pizza with a white sauce and the other with a red sauce. Love the crust too.

name: Sherry Hughes
text: Always clean, and always friendly!

name: Frankie Bodnar
text: Great pizza, good price.. only bad thing is all the call in to go orders that push ahead of the people waiting in line to order

name: Helix
text: Really good pizza and one of my favorite pizza places. The only reasons I 4 star this is 1. Long line 2. The price. But if you are able to afford it I would say go there over any other place.

name: Nevin Harris
text: Fresh ingredients, fast & friendly service, tasty pizza, including the gluten free! Our regular pizza spot. If you're hungry definitely get one to yourself. I like meat so I'm usually good with half. No complaints, visit as regularly as my diet allows!

name: Jason Woodson
text: Love how fast you can put together your own personalized pizza! They definitely have it down!!

name: madi good
text: I completely destroyed an entire pizza to myself. I got the Green Stripe and Meat Lovers. I was a disappointed with the amount of chicken on the Green Stripe pizza but overall it was satisfying and delicious!

name: Joel Kleinman
text: Love it when you build your own pizza.

name: Rachael DiPietro
text: The personal pizzas here are made to order quickly and location is easy to get in/ out of. Great place to stop if you're in a hurry and they have an outdoor seating area!

name: Susan Stemple
text: Delicious Build your own Pizza! Staff is always friendly! Downfall is not enough seating especially is you have a group larger than 4, and it's very loud.  But great food!

name: Ashley Williams
text:
Had to change my review.
They have failed to meet their expectations. …More

name: Jessica Evans
text: Always fast fresh and affordable, straight forward.

name: Amber Mejia
text: Customizable personal pizzas for a great price!! Service is fast and friendly.... they even serve bottled beer! It's always packed around lunch time so be prepared to wait.  The only downside is the parking lot, it shares with a few other businesses so you might have to park further away or circle around for a bit

name: Philip Rivera
text: Pizza is good.  Flow us a little off.   Need to deploy assistance to the pizza cutting/plating/ box up area before it backs up.

name: Christian Johnson
text: I've been here over a dozen times, always had a good experience. The great thing about blaze is the option to build your own pizza (or choose one of theirs). The pizzas are personal style pizza, my wife and I generally get our own pizzas. …More

name: Jessica Dean Israel
text: This place is always very very very busy. But the wait goes very fast. Line out the door to ordering took 10 minutes. Not too bad. It is a make your own pizza place. It is an individual pizza that is made to order. Order ahead online to save a wait.

name: Mac Ann Chieze
text: This pizza is super amazing. I can't believe how fast they make it. Really delicious and a good price. Good service too.

name: Shelby Carlson
text: We discovered this since we do not have one in Idaho and man it was amazing!

name: Chavon D. Walker
text: Friendly, i love watching them build my pizza. My sons favorite place for pizza! Best blood orange lemonade

name: Warren Spayth
text: Friendly staff. Awesome pizza. Reasonable prices. Ask for David. He was awesome!

name: Tyler Cornia
text: I love this place! I was told by a friend to try it out when I moved out here to Henderson and it doesn't disappoint! You get to create your won pizza with as many toppings as you want and it's fire baked so you know it's good.

name: Sheri Dennis
text: For $8, the pizza was huge.  Kids could have shared but they had more fun creating their own masterpiece.   Super crispy thin crust.  So many employees behind the counter to keep things moving.  It was fun and I've gone back 4 times already

name: Tony Alhwayek
text: Great service. Delicious food. Would definitely go there every chance I get.

name: Russell Ellsworth
text: Usually busy but are well staffed with employees who keep the line moving. The fast fired pizza allows them to handle crowds. Indoor seating is limited when busy.

name: Eric Ferber
text: Ordered pizza at 6:28 pm.  Received pizza at 7:05pm.  Good concept, tasty pizza, nice try.  Notsoblazepizza

name: William Taylor
text: Great Food & Excellent Service !

text: Build your own. Seriously. You can have the best pizza here if you get adventurous and pile on those topings. You can even eat meat/dairy free (pro tip: top with arugula). Try this pizza!

name: Jennifer Simpson
text: Our family favorite! Everyone. Gets what they want and we can be as adventurous or as basic as we would like. Amazing!

name: Robert Miller
text: Very nice staff. Pleasant service. Real good pizza

text: I love this place! The staff is so friendly, they all greet me by name each time I walk in as if they are happy to see me😊. They make a point to remember my lunch order and always take great care of me. Great pizza and great customer service!

text: Many toppings to choose from and cauliflower crust.

text: Pizza was made fast and well. I wanted corn, which they didn’t have, but they let me know nicely and I was fine with that. At the register, I ordered a s’mores dessert heated up and sat down with my little sister to wait for our order. She …More

name: Casey Weisbach
text: This place is great! You get to create your own pizza from the crust up. The have decent prices. It is very busy most hours. They only have one dessert and basic Coke fountain drinks. The wait for a pizza is not that long and they are always very hot. I would highly recommend this place for the pizza!

name: Kim Stone
text: Always friendly staff, and good pies at a great price.

name: Amanda Davis

text: I like on the fly custom pizza and they deliver on that promise. The staff is helpful, accommodating, and friendly too!  Plus, I can get a tasty salad for my low-carb days.
